comments: Not actually an author of a plant name but of the article in which E.Martini published the following fossil name: Triquetrorhabdulus E. Martini in Whittard et Bradshaw, Submar. Geol. Geophys. 407. Oct 1965.
source: M.E.B. to Flora Europaea.  Biogr. details in BSBI News, 115: 63 (Sept. 2010).
